author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HUMBERTO PRODUCING DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST... ...GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OUTER RAINBANDS ARE POSSIBLE ACROSS BERMUDA TUESDAY INTO WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...HUMBERTO PRODUCING DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST... ...GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OUTER RAINBANDS ARE POSSIBLE ACROSS BERMUDA TUESDAY INTO WEDNESDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 29.1, -68.1 with movement NNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 942 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HUMBERTO PRODUCING DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST... ...GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OUTER RAINBANDS ARE POSSIBLE ACROSS BERMUDA TUESDAY INTO WEDNESDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 29.1, -68.1 with movement NNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 942 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
